title: ISic030272. I.Sicily inscription 030272
body:
Facsimile Images

[---]Ε[---]
[---]ΕΝΙ[---]
[---]Ι ἥμιλ̣[ιτρα---]
[---]Ι τάλα[ντα]

Apparatus criticus

Text of Arangio-Ruiz ; Manganaro: [- ἕ]ν ἡμι[λίτριον ?]
4: Manganaro: [- -]ταλ[αντ-]

translation

commentary

Notwithstanding the statements of SEG and Manganaro himself, there are subtle differences between the text read by Manganaro, and that of Orsi / Arangio-Ruiz.

bibliography

    49.1313.C https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796 Orsi 1900 53 no. 23 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001707 Arangio-Ruiz and Olivieri 1925 129 no. 14.3 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001378 Manganaro 1999 62 no. 49 fig. 130 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001813
    180 n. 7 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000160
